title: Ticket #2217: Rename "owner" to "creator" in tktedit screen
description: On the "edit" screen for a ticket (ex https://condor-wiki.cs.wisc.edu/index.cgi/tktedit?tn=3 ), the field identifying the person who created the ticket is "Owner". I repeatedly change it when I meant to change "Assigned to". It's labeled as "Creator" on the actual ticket display page (ex https://condor-wiki.cs.wisc.edu/index.cgi/tktview?tn=3) Proposed: change the label from "Owner" to "Creator". on the tktedit pages.
creator: adesmet
